mapper.select: /** [Notice_SQL.xml][egovframework.example.notice.service.impl.NoticeMapper.AllNoticeList][어드민 공지사항 전체][hanq] */ SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.* , FLOOR((A.RNUM -1) / #{rows}) + 1 PAGE_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT NCODE, M.UID, NTITLE, NREGDATE, VIEWS , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 RNUM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE) TOTAL_CNT , (SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / #{rows}) FROM NOTICE) TOTAL_PAGE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON N.UCODE = M.UCODE , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R )A )B WHERE B.PAGE_NUMBER = #{page};
mapper.update: /** [Notice_SQL.xml][egovframework.example.notice.service.impl.NoticeMapper.addViews][조회수 증가][hanq] */ UPDATE NOTICE SET VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 WHERE NCODE=#{ncode}
